game.name: Crossy Road Zombies
game.description:
Your city is attacked again by a horde of dangerous and blood-thirsty zombies and you have decided to run while getting through as many as you can. Do you think that it is a right time to accept such kind of running challenge? Join Crossy Road Zombies and be prepared to get your character out of this zombies filled city! Be careful friends as you would have only 3 lives to use! Try not to bump into any of them otherwise you will lose your life!

Put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to make your character run on the road like never before! Make sure to avoid as many zombies as you can to go as far as possible. Your game will be over in case if all your three lives are finished. Do not forget to collect the power-ups and extra lives that would definitely help to boost your speed! Get a shield that protects you from the deadly zombies!

Grab as many coins as you can along the way to purchase new skins for your character in this HTML5 escaping game! You could also use coins to buy more upgrades and power-ups. All the best for having a wonderful adventure running and escaping experience! We are sure that you would not stop here, but browse through our all games category since we have added more new games today to adventure and other game categories.
